page.title: 07MEDIA
page.content:
{TELEVISION}now occupies a major part of our lives.We found that most children watched from three hours a day upwards. In our area nearly every home had a television and many had two or three or more. Televisions were found in many rooms including the lounge,kitchen and bedrooms. One of the most popular soap opera's is Dallas, its about an oil company with people fighting over money. Another good programme is Different Strokes, its about two black boys,one called Arnold and one called Willis.They were adopted by a white man. It is very funny. 92% of people have got TV sets.
{RADIO -}nearly every home in this area has a radio. There are four national channels plus two local stations.
